overview:
As Executive Vice President of Business Development, Stan also serves as a board member and partner at Brevity Ventures. Since joining Brevity nearly two years ago, Stan has raised all of the necessary financial capital for Brevity’s team to grow sevenfold, establish a presence in the market and develop an intellectual property portfolio. As Director of Sales, he has developed close relationships with investors, partners and clients and works to generate opportunities that enable Brevityâ€™s continuous growth.

A graduate of the S.I. Newhouse School of Public Communications at Syracuse University, Stan brings over 25 years experience creating, organizing and closing multi-million dollar real estate deals in New York City and across the U.S. Stan has close relationships with many influential people and a proven track record of raising capital from high net worth individuals.

Stan currently serves on the Board of Trustees for the New York Chapter of the Crohn’s and Colitis Foundation. He is on the membership board of the Young Men’s/Women’s Real Estate Association of New York and previously served on the organization’s Board of Governors. Stan also sits on various committees as part of the Real Estate Board of New York.

He lives in Manhattan with his wife and daughter.
